dict.acceptation: 单一的；（打斗、比赛等）一对一的；惟一的；适于一人的；
单程票；（旅馆等的）单人房间；[复数]（高尔夫球一对一的）二人对抗赛；[常用复数][美国、加拿大英语]未婚（或单身）男子（或女子）；

sent.orig: Single: when in dual mode, select SINGLE to change meter back to one full screen meter.
sent.trans: 单屏显示：当在双屏显示模式下，选择单屏(SINGLE)显示将使仪表从双屏显示返回单屏全屏幕显示。

sent.orig: A single construction and single-side moisture transported fabric has been designed through single-side finishing.
sent.trans: 利用单面整理法开发了一类具有亲疏水双侧结构的单层单向吸湿排汗快干织物。

sent.orig: General support for single mode, single-mode limit, single puzzle mode, multiplayer, Versus, and other man-machine games.
sent.trans: 支持单人普通模式、单人限时模式、单人迷题模式、多人对战、人机对战等多种游戏方式。

sent.orig: YHB series chemical submersible pump is vertical single stage single-suction centrifugal pump.
sent.trans: YHB系列化工液下泵是立式单级单吸离心泵。

sent.orig: We have not one single reaction from single player, saying that he is interested in leaving.
sent.trans: 我们没有从哪个球员那里得到一个回应说是他很想离开。
